content:
Hi all,

Let me remind you that a great way to get your best work of 2021 rejected (again) and to delay its formal publication by at least (another) 6 months while increasing the total submissions number of a wonderful meeting is to submit to one of the ETAPS 2022 conferences - ESOP, FASE, FoSSaCS and TACAS!

FoSSaCS is especially relevant for the ACT community.

The deadline for full paper submission is next Thu 14 Oct 23:59 AoE.

See the call for papers here:

https://etaps.org/2022/call-for-papers

The details for FoSSaCS are here:

https://etaps.org/2022/fossacs
